PHRASE.LANG: This crackling log fire nestled in a handsome stone hearth will toast your toes and your marshmallows. [#Legal]
Ce feu crépitant niché dans un joli foyer de pierres pourra griller vos orteils autant que vos marshmallows. [#Legal]
Das knisternde Feuer dieses schicken Steinkamins kann nicht nur Zehen rösten, sondern auch Marshmallows. [#Legal]
Questo legna che crepita in un favoloso focolare di pietra riscalderà i tuoi piedi… e anche i marshmallow, [#Legal]
Este fuego de madera chisporroteante colocado en una preciosa chimenea de piedra te tostará los pies y las nubes. [#Legal]
This crackling log fire nestled in a handsome stone hearth will toast your toes and your marshmallows. [#Legal]
This crackling log fire nestled in a handsome stone hearth will toast your toes and your marshmallows. [#Legal]
